jobCategories.jobDescription: Oversee the accounting department functions with a focus on ensuring the timely and accurate delivery of financial statements and reporting.
Oversee an organization's daily accounting operations, including the accounting, payroll, accounts receivable and accounts payable departments.
Prepare and maintain financial records to track the organizations assets, liabilities, profit and loss, tax liabilities, and other related financial activities.
Responsible for ensuring all incoming payments are received and processed.
Responsible for managing and maintaining financial records, with a particular emphasis on processing invoices and other bills.
Oversee and supervise the payroll functions of the organization, ensuring pay is processed on time, accurately, and in compliance with government regulations.

Responsible for tracking a company's financial performance against plan, analyzing business performance and market conditions to create forecasts, and helping senior management make tactical and strategic decisions by providing periodic reports.
Prepare and submit tax returns, analyze financial information, and ensure all departments are informed of the current best practices in the field of tax compliance and accounting.
Coordinate and provide high-quality administrative support to the executive team.
